title: free long term rent accommodation
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Females only;

A professional white ex-military British Mature man.

I want to help a women who is in need of an accommodation, papers/ passport or visa.

I am a disable guy, suffering from diabetes...  here to find a good honest and trust worthy  single open minded female of any nationality or culture, as well as age; 

Looking for a female willing to provide help and care and light house chores around the house.

In return for this help I offer genuinely Free rent House share with usage of all facilities / appliancies, free food and drinks, own key to property to come and go as one pleases , usage of all plasma screens with built in Netflix and fast WiFi Internet broadband .....usage of 24/7 Gas Central heating, as well as visa papers  ;)

 My home is always warm &cosy. Close to all shops and public transport as well town centers too.

I’m a very caring person,  and loving in many ways and wish to find someone alike

 I’m also very open minded, helpful, soft hearted, spontaneous and person as well happy to aid the lady at all times and even to make sure she has funds too, treat her as a lady, only to see her happy and satisfy her.

I seek a genuine loyal friendship as well a companionship (to share laughter fun intrests and talkative sociable times )

If this offer appeals to you , and you would like to contact me for further details.


If you can attach a photograph to your email, will be amazing :)


Take care, stay safe and hope to hear from you soon .



George
